mapper.select: SELECT IF(ROUND(SUM(order_money_gongju),2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(SUM(order_money_gongju),2),0)+ IF(ROUND(SUM(order_money_haocai),2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(SUM(order_money_haocai),2),0) AS saleAllMoney, IF(ROUND(SUM(order_money_gongju),2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(SUM(order_money_gongju),2),0) AS gongjuAllMoney, IF(ROUND(SUM(order_money_haocai),2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(SUM(order_money_haocai),2),0) AS haocaiAllMoney, COUNT(order_id) AS orderNum FROM sale_income WHERE sale_id=#{saleId};

SELECT IF(ROUND(SUM(balance_in),2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(SUM(balance_in),2),0) AS allCommission FROM balance WHERE haocai_money IS NOT NULL AND sale_id=#{saleId} OR gongju_money IS NOT NULL AND sale_id=#{saleId}

SELECT si.sale_id, o.order_id, o.created AS orderCreated, u.true_name AS userName, u.phone AS userPhone, IF(ROUND(si.order_money_haocai,2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(si.order_money_haocai,2),0)+IF(ROUND(si.order_money_gongju,2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(si.order_money_gongju,2),0) AS allMoney, IF(ROUND(si.refund_money_gongju,2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(si.refund_money_gongju,2),0)+IF(ROUND(si.refund_money_haocai,2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(si.refund_money_haocai,2),0) AS refundMoney, IF(ROUND(si.order_money_haocai,2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(si.order_money_haocai,2),0) AS haocaiMoney, IF(ROUND(si.order_money_gongju,2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(si.order_money_gongju,2),0) AS gongjuMoney, (IF(ROUND(si.order_money_haocai,2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(si.order_money_haocai,2),0)+IF(ROUND(si.order_money_gongju,2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(si.order_money_gongju,2),0))- (IF(ROUND(si.refund_money_gongju,2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(si.refund_money_gongju,2),0)+IF(ROUND(si.refund_money_haocai,2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(si.refund_money_haocai,2),0)) AS actualMoney FROM sale_income si LEFT JOIN ordera o ON o.order_id=si.order_id LEFT JOIN USER u ON u.user_id=o.user_id WHERE si.sale_id=#{saleId} AND u.bind_sale_time < o.created AND o.state !=0 GROUP BY si.order_id ORDER BY o.created DESC LIMIT ${page.currentNumber},${page.numberPerPage}
SELECT count(0) from ( SELECT count(0) FROM sale_income si LEFT JOIN ordera o ON o.order_id=si.order_id LEFT JOIN USER u ON si.sale_id=u.sale_id WHERE si.sale_id=#{saleId} GROUP BY si.order_id ) AS a

SELECT u.true_name AS userName, u.phone AS userPhone, o.created AS orderCreated, o.state AS orderState, IF(ROUND(si.order_money_haocai,2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(si.order_money_haocai,2),0) AS orderMoneyHaocai, IF(ROUND(si.order_money_gongju,2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(si.order_money_gongju,2),0) AS orderMoneyGongju, IF(ROUND(si.refund_money_haocai,2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(si.refund_money_haocai,2),0) AS refundMoneyHaocai, IF(ROUND(si.refund_money_gongju,2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(si.refund_money_gongju,2),0) AS refundMoneyGongju, (IF(ROUND(si.order_money_haocai,2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(si.order_money_haocai,2),0))- (IF(ROUND(si.refund_money_haocai,2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(si.refund_money_haocai,2),0)) AS actualMoneyHaocai, (IF(ROUND(si.order_money_gongju,2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(si.order_money_gongju,2),0))- (IF(ROUND(si.refund_money_gongju,2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(si.refund_money_gongju,2),0)) AS actualMoneyGongju FROM sale_income si LEFT JOIN ordera o ON o.order_id=si.order_id LEFT JOIN USER u ON si.sale_id=u.sale_id WHERE si.sale_id=#{saleId} AND si.order_id=#{orderId} GROUP BY si.order_id

SELECT oi.item_name, oi.item_property_namea, oi.item_property_nameb, oi.item_property_namec, oi.price, oi.num, (oi.price*oi.num) AS total FROM ordera o LEFT JOIN order_item oi ON o.order_id=oi.order_id LEFT JOIN USER u ON o.user_id=u.user_id LEFT JOIN sale_income si ON u.sale_id=si.sale_id WHERE o.order_id=#{orderId} AND si.sale_id=#{saleId} GROUP BY oi.item_name LIMIT ${page.currentNumber},${page.numberPerPage}

SELECT count(0) FROM ( SELECT count(0) FROM ordera o LEFT JOIN order_item oi ON o.order_id=oi.order_id LEFT JOIN USER u ON o.user_id=u.user_id LEFT JOIN sale_income si ON u.sale_id=si.sale_id WHERE o.order_id=#{orderId} AND si.sale_id=#{saleId} GROUP BY oi.item_name ) AS a
